content.raw:
This test is always failing for me. Backtrace:

~~~
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
__strcmp_sse2_unaligned () at ../sysdeps/x86_64/multiarch/strcmp-sse2-unaligned.S:30
30	../sysdeps/x86_64/multiarch/strcmp-sse2-unaligned.S: No such file or directory.
(gdb) bt
#0  __strcmp_sse2_unaligned () at ../sysdeps/x86_64/multiarch/strcmp-sse2-unaligned.S:30
#1  0x00007fffe57d7af0 in stub_find_dynamic () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglapi.so.0
#2  0x00007fffe57d795e in _glapi_get_proc_address () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglapi.so.0
#3  0x00007fffec571529 in glXGetProcAddressARB () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/mesa/libGL.so.1
#4  0x00007fffca233620 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-1.8.0/RenderSystem_GL.so
#5  0x00007fffca243c5d in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-1.8.0/RenderSystem_GL.so
#6  0x00007fffca21bee1 in Ogre::GLRenderSystem::initialiseContext(Ogre::RenderWindow*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-1.8.0/RenderSystem_GL.so
#7  0x00007fffca2221cc in Ogre::GLRenderSystem::_createRenderWindow(std::string const&, unsigned int, unsigned int, bool, std::map<std::string, std::string, std::less<std::string>, Ogre::STLAllocator<std::pair<std::string const, std::string>, Ogre::CategorisedAllocPolicy<(Ogre::MemoryCategory)0> > > const*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/OGRE-1.8.0/RenderSystem_GL.so
#8  0x00007fffefea4612 in Ogre::Root::createRenderWindow(std::string const&, unsigned int, unsigned int, bool, std::map<std::string, std::string, std::less<std::string>, Ogre::STLAllocator<std::pair<std::string const, std::string>, Ogre::CategorisedAllocPolicy<(Ogre::MemoryCategory)0> > > const*) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOgreMain.so.1.8.1
#9  0x00007ffff5b130fe in gazebo::rendering::WindowManager::CreateWindow (this=0x8ac480, 
    _ogreHandle=..., _width=_width@entry=1, _height=_height@entry=1)
    at /home/louise/code/gazeboC/gazebo/rendering/WindowManager.cc:117
#10 0x00007ffff5aaf77b in gazebo::rendering::RenderEngine::Load (
    this=0x7ffff7b92d80 <SingletonT<gazebo::rendering::RenderEngine>::GetInstance()::t>)
    at /home/louise/code/gazeboC/gazebo/rendering/RenderEngine.cc:154
#11 0x00007ffff5ab3285 in gazebo::rendering::load ()
    at /home/louise/code/gazeboC/gazebo/rendering/RenderingIface.cc:33
#12 0x00007ffff638e908 in QMetaMethod::invoke(QObject*, Qt::ConnectionType, QGenericReturnArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument, QGenericArgument) const ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtCore.so.4
#13 0x00007ffff73aa08f in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtTest.so.4
#14 0x00007ffff73acd8d in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtTest.so.4
#15 0x00007ffff73adddf in QTest::qExec(QObject*, int, char**) ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQtTest.so.4

    at /home/louise/code/gazeboC/gazebo/gui/viewers/ImagesView_TEST.cc:148
